channel.title: A few questions
channel.description: ok ive never made any server of any kind before and i thought i would try a rs pserver 1st and i need a help with a few things 1, whats a good source and client to start off with? 2, is there anyway to make a "market" where people can buy game items with real money on site 3, how do you change the name of the client thing e.g. on rovascape when u press play and the login window comes up how to u change it to something else? would be great if some1 could help me :)

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @WiseMen WiseMen
item.description:
@WiseMen wrote:

gimpgimp:

thanks for the replies but on question 3. i didnt mean just the bit at the top i meant the whole background of the login client

Use the search bar on client/source, and use the search bar on here. It’s not hard

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @WiseMen WiseMen
item.description:
@WiseMen wrote:

[quote=“gimpgimp, post:1, topic:339557”]ok ive never made any server of any kind before and i thought i would try a rs pserver 1st and i need a help with a few things
1, whats a good source and client to start off with?
2, is there anyway to make a “market” where people can buy game items with real money on site
3, how do you change the name of the client thing e.g. on rovascape when u press play and the login window comes up how to u change it to something else?
would be great if some1 could help me :)[/quote]

  1. You’d need SQL for that?
  2. Client.java, GUI.Java
  3. I’d say Delta, Winterlove, Project Insanity (474)

Don’t flame because I went from 2,3,1. I done that because I answered in what order I looked at his questions from. Ktnxbai

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @pkpoison pkpoison
item.description:
@pkpoison wrote:

Well honestly a good base is Hyperion but you’re obvoisuly not that good at java so id say DeltaCleaned.
Yes there is a way to market peoples items. You can do it manually set up a donation list and have people donate for items.
Things you can change such as names are easy! Go into client.java and press Ctrl + F and search for RovaScape or whatever the name is and replace it with your server name and then click compile.

Good luck programming

Read full topic
